*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Kerr to Austin, August 8. 1826. Friction with Martin De Leon.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Delion's Guadaloupe River*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="08-08-1826">8th August 1826*/date_mentioned*—*/p* *p*Dear Col°-*/p*
*p*I have just arrive[d] here on the way to *location_mentioned*San Antonio*/location_mentioned*, and hope to see your *person_mentioned*Bro*/person_mentioned*. there. I came by the *location_mentioned*mouth of the La vacca*/location_mentioned*, where I saw *person_mentioned*Col°- Dewitt*/person_mentioned*, and a number of people, say 40. *person_mentioned*men*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*women*/person_mentioned*, and *person_mentioned*children*/person_mentioned*—all in good health. They wish to get up the *location_mentioned*river */location_mentioned*to the *location_mentioned*red Bluffs*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*It can be satisfactorily proven that *person_mentioned*Delion */person_mentioned*or his *person_mentioned*sons*/person_mentioned*, broke up and tore to pieces the little vessel of *person_mentioned*Dickerson */person_mentioned*that was Left in the *location_mentioned*Grssite [Garcitas] Creek*/location_mentioned* last *date_mentioned n="summer - 1826">summer */date_mentioned*and has removed part of the planks to this place and had it stacked up. The ballance of the planks are thrown on the *location_mentioned*bank of the Creek*/location_mentioned*, to season as is supposed by the *person_mentioned*citizens */person_mentioned*here.*/p*
*p*I am not very well—have some fever and head Ache—I hope you have before this recovered your health, and able to attend to business.*/p*
*p*I shall make all possible haste in my power, but the hotness of the weather; a poor horse, and bad health makes it quite uncertain when I shall be at *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Kerr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
